name: ConsoTracker - track everything everywhere
description: ConsoTracker helps you to keep track of your usages: electricity, gas, water, weight or anything you can measure.  Main features : - EASY tracking of values, - elegant DESIGN, - CHARTS displaying the evolution of your data, - MACROSCOPIC view of your tracker, - Simple of double values trackers.  Let me know if you want a new feature in the app!
